#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main(){
    long long int id,t,x[3],y[3],a,b,c,i,tmp;
    cin>>id;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        for(i=0;i<3;i++){
            cin>>x[i]>>y[i];
        }
        a=(x[1]-x[0])*(x[1]-x[0]) + (y[1]-y[0])*(y[1]-y[0]);
        b=(x[2]-x[1])*(x[2]-x[1]) + (y[2]-y[1])*(y[2]-y[1]);
        c=(x[0]-x[2])*(x[0]-x[2]) + (y[0]-y[2])*(y[0]-y[2]);
        //cout<<a<<"\n"<<b<<"\n"<<c<<"\n";

        if(id==1){
            if(a==b||b==c||a==c)
                cout<<"Isosceles triangle\n";
            else
                cout<<"Scalene triangle\n";
        }
        else{
            if(a==b||b==c||a==c)
                cout<<"Isosceles ";
            else
                cout<<"Scalene ";
            if(a+b==c||b+c==a||a+c==b)
                cout<<"right triangle\n";
           else if(a+b<c||a+c<b||b+c<a)
               cout<<"obtuse triangle\n";
           else{
                cout<<"acute triangle\n";
           }
        }
    }

    return 0;
}
